description:
* After the released the successful fitness appz like Pushups, Squats, and now we are fell very happy to release Couch to 10K (C to 10K).
* This app is perfect for the police test, walkers, joggers, runners, marathon training, running, jogging, fitness, exercise, weight loss, performance, interval trainers.
* This application will help you to achieving nonstop 10km running.
* This app also contains the 13 week schedule which will improve your ability to run 10 Km's without stopping.
* Alternate between intervals of jogging & walking in an increasingly challenging set of workouts.
* No need to remember the schedule.
* This app also contains alerts while changing the activity.
* Each workout session is from 30-40 minutes long.
* If you re followed this schedule definitely gains strength using this application and performing the training program.
